title: One Piece, Season 1, Episode 37: The Episode That Changed Casual Viewers Into Lifelong Fans
author: Sabrina Roberts
description: In-depth analysis of Episode 37's significance as a turning point for viewers, focusing on Nami's character development and the iconic straw hat moment. Discusses how this episode transformed casual viewers into dedicated fans through its emotional depth and character growth.
spoilerWarning: Contains spoilers for Episode 37 and general discussion of character relationships

title: 10 Best One Piece Episodes That Will Make Any Viewer an Instant Fan
author: ScreenRant Staff
description: List article featuring Episode 37 as one of the best episodes to convert new viewers. Highlights the dark and emotional nature of the episode, emphasizing Luffy's support of Nami and the iconic walk to Arlong Park.

title: LUFFY GIVES NAMI HIS HAT AND THE WALK TO ARLONG PARK IS EVERYTHING | One Piece Reaction Episode 37
author: Various Reactors
description: Reaction video compilation featuring multiple reactors responding to the iconic straw hat scene and the Straw Hats' march to Arlong Park. Captures the emotional impact of the episode on first-time viewers.

title: LUFFY...HELP ME ! WALK TO ARLONG PARK | ONE PIECE EPISODE 37 BEST REACTION COMPILATION
author: Compilation Creator
description: Another compilation of the best reactions to Episode 37's most iconic moments, focusing on Nami's plea for help and the crew's march to battle. Shows the universal emotional impact of these scenes across different viewers.

title: One Piece Reaction Episode 37
author: All Ages of Geek
description: First-time watch reaction to Episode 37, featuring live commentary and emotional responses to the pivotal moments. Invites viewers to sync up on streaming services for interactive watch-along experience.

title: Nami demande de l'aide Ã  Luffy ! Marche vers Arlong park | Analyse One Piece ep 37
author: PhilippeGns
description: French-language podcast analysis of Episode 37, discussing Nami's request for help and the march to Arlong Park. Part of a comprehensive Arlong Park arc analysis series.
spoilerWarning: Contains full episode spoilers and arc discussion

title: Episode 37 Review: OnePiece Anime
author: Tayyab Ali
description: Written review and analysis of Episode 37's plot, character moments, and significance in the overall narrative.

title: Netflix's One Piece Reboot Includes THAT Tragic Nami Scene, Confirms Actress
author: The Direct Staff
description: Article discussing how the Netflix live-action adaptation recreated the iconic Episode 37 scene, with Emily Rudd (live-action Nami actress) confirming the importance of bringing this moment to life in the adaptation.
spoilerWarning: Contains spoilers for Episode 37 and Netflix adaptation

title: One Piece's most important moment is the emotional climax of the Netflix series
author: Popverse Staff
description: Analysis of how the Episode 37 straw hat moment serves as the emotional climax of the Netflix live-action adaptation, discussing its significance across both versions.
spoilerWarning: Contains spoilers for both anime and live-action
